name: .DN
summary: Learn about .DN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can only open DN files with Adobe Dimension. To open the DN file with Dimension, select File → Open... or double-click the icon of the DN file if Dimension is already associated with the DN file.
To convert a DN file to another format in Adobe Dimension, select File → Export or select the Render view. Some formats you can export the DN file format to include .GLTF, .GLB, .OBJ, .PNG, and .PSD.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .dn file in Adobe Dimension 3.4
images.caption: DN file open in Adobe Dimension 3.4
